4. Reba Godfrey

Reba Godfrey
============

![Reba Godfrey](https://www.marshalltexas.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3142 "Reba Godfrey")

Reba Godfrey, District 5
------------------------

**Term:** 2022 to 2026  
[Email Reba Godfrey](mailto:Godfrey.Reba@marshalltexas.net)

### Biography

Reba Godfrey is a life-long resident of District 5. She attended Pemberton Sr. High School and graduated from Marshall High in 1971. She graduated Summa Cum Laude from Wiley College in 1975 with a Bachelor of Science degree in Elementary Education and a minor in English. In 1980, she graduated Summa Cum Laude from Prairie View A&M University with a Master of Education degree. She married her 12th grade sweetheart, Willard Godfrey, in 1975. They are the parents of a daughter & son.

### Employment

Mrs. Godfrey worked 36 years as an elementary teacher before retiring in August 2012.  She and her husband resided in Tulsa, OK, where she taught for one year. Beginning in 2007, she was honored to work several years with K-12 students of Marshall as a Wiley College NASA SEMAA teacher.

### Community Service

* Evangelist in northwest Louisiana and northeast Texas
* Heart to Heart Hospice
* Marshall Prayer Troopers
* Galilee Missionary Baptist Church
